MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH13 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:47am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on our overhead line network near West Mill Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:49pm on the 28th of April 2021
